title: We’re Getting the Band Back Together | Tower Records
description:
Can a once-revered brick-and-mortar music chain be brought back to life in the era of Amazon and Spotify? 
Podcast production by Jess Miller and Cleo Levin.
Slate Plus members get ad-free podcasts and bonus episodes of shows like Dear Prudence and Slow Burn. Sign up now to listen and support our work.
